message: I suggest a fair 60-40 split in my favor, considering I'm affected by 5% inflation each round while you're not.
Since you rejected a generous offer, I propose a less favorable split for you. Take it or leave it, the money is worth less to you each round.
I'm offering a more balanced split now. Due to 10% cumulative inflation for me, this is actually worth less than my first offer. Let's be reasonable and finish this game.
You're running out of options. I'm increasing my share. This is the last offer you'll get from me.
